TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebFormsRootDesigner extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner, class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter, class System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner, class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class WebFormsRootDesigner Implements IDesignerFilter, IDisposable, IRootDesigner
public ref class WebFormsRootDesigner abstract : IDisposable, System::ComponentModel::Design::IDesignerFilter, System::ComponentModel::Design::IRootDesigner
type WebFormsRootDesigner = class interface IRootDesigner interface IDesigner interface IDisposable interface IDesignerFilter

summary.span: 提供 Web Forms 網頁設計階段功能的基底類別，並允許在執行階段存取與操作 Web Forms 網頁內所包含的元件和控制項。

span.span: Provides a base class for the design-time functionality of a Web Forms page and allows access to and manipulation of components and controls that are contained within the Web Forms page at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計主應用程式，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，必須提供自己的衍生的版本類別的控制項設計工具，透過設計工具的屬性。A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], must provide its own derived version of the class to control designers through the property of the designer. 控制對設計工具使用來存取及管理內含的 Web Form 網頁在設計階段屬性。Control designers use the property to access and manipulate the containing Web Forms page at design time.

para.span: 當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫下列成員：

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members:
- The , , , , , and properties.
- The , , , , and methods.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 Web 伺服器控制項加入 Web Form 網頁。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, adds a Web server control to the Web Forms page.

span.span: The ID of the control that was added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然控制項可能已指派給它，ID，如果具有相同識別碼的 Web Form 網頁中已經有控制項，則會指派新的識別碼。Although a control might already have an ID assigned to it, if there is already a control in the Web Forms page with the same ID, a new ID is assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫控制項設計工具，並讓這類實作在設計主應用程式，透過 Web Form 網頁的控制項設計工具的動作項目[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The method is called by a control designer and provides a way for action items for the control designer to be implemented in the Web Forms page through a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].

summary.span: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 。

span.span: For a description of this member, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

related.span: 擴充設計階段支援

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Verbs As DesignerVerbCollection

summary.span: 取得設計工具所支援的設計階段動詞命令。

span.span: Gets the design-time verbs that are supported by the designer.

value.span: 設計工具所支援之 物件的陣列，如果元件沒有動詞命令，則為 。

span.span: An array of objects supported by the designer; otherwise, , if the component has no verbs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 通常，設計階段環境提供**屬性**元件的快顯功能表命令。Typically, a design-time environment provides a **Properties** command on a shortcut menu for a component. 因此，請勿在設計工具指定的動詞命令的集合中包含類似的項目。Therefore, do not include a similar entry in the collection of designer-specified verbs.
